nodes.text: The mephite crystal mines was used by the Galactic Republic on the Eastern Ice Shelf of the planet Ilum to process the mephite variety of the Adegan crystal. During the time of the Battle of Ilum in the Galactic War the mines were raided by the Sith Empire forces.
The Mephite crystal mines appear as an area on Ilum in the 2011 video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
